text: Mischa Merz (born 1964) is an Australian boxer, painter and journalist. She was the winner of the Australian National Championship in 2001, and a winner in the Master's Division at the 2009 National Women's Golden Gloves. ==Bibliography== * Bruising: A Journey Through Gender (Pan Macmillan Australia, 2000) * Bruising: A Boxer's Story (second edition) (Vulgar Press, 2009) * The Sweetest Thing (Seven Stories Press, 2011) ==References== ==External links== * Mischa Merz Boxing * Mischa Merz's blog Category:Australian women boxers Category:Australian women journalists Category:Australian journalists Category:1967 births Category:Living people Category:Australian women painters Category:21st-century women artists
title: Mischa Merz
